name: Excavator Pick
effect: When you hit a target on a surface, draw a 3 space line from your mech that overlaps the target, all spaces in this line become difficult terrain. This weapon deals 10 AP kinetic damage to terrain.

name: Resonator Mattock
effect: When you hit a Target that is on a surface you may place 2 size 1 pieces of terrain with 5 HP and 5 Evasion adjacent to that Target. If you destroy a piece of terrain with this weapon it releases a resonating pulse in a Burst 1 Area. all characters except this mech caught in the area take 2d6 Kinetic Damage and are Impaired until the end of their next turn, on a successful Hull Save they take ½ damage and are not Impaired.
